ISSUE.TITLE: Administrators can't edit charts made by other users
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I just upgraded to 0.8.0 and noticed as an admin, I can no longer edit charts made by other users. I can edit the query, however.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #549 from shinjiikeda/master Feature: Vertica query runner

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Allow admins to edit everything Closes #562
